summary: The diff adds an AIVideoPage, navigation between Chat and AI Video, local placeholder clip generation, and a browser download helper. However, because AIVideoPage.tsx is truncated, key acceptance-criteria UI elements (clip preview, per-clip download button behavior, and the share/upload help section) cannot be fully verified from the provided diff summary.

missing_requirements.requirement: Each generated clip has a visible preview area or a clearly labeled placeholder preview state on completion.
missing_requirements.reason: A local clip generator is implemented and clips are added to state, but the provided AIVideoPage.tsx content is truncated before any clip list/preview rendering is shown, so the preview/placeholder UI cannot be confirmed.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add a Download action for each generated clip; Download triggers a browser download with a video extension; on failure, Download is disabled/hidden and an English error is shown.
missing_requirements.reason: Download utilities and a handleDownload function exist, and error clips include an error string, but the diff snippet is truncated before showing any per-clip Download button, its disabled/hidden behavior on error, or the displayed error message in the UI.

missing_requirements.requirement: Provide an in-app, clearly labeled upload/share help UI with platform-agnostic steps (no social API integrations).
missing_requirements.reason: Social/share-related icons are imported, but the AIVideoPage.tsx snippet is truncated before any help section content is visible, so the required labeled help UI and platform-agnostic steps cannot be verified.

hallucinated_features.description: Adds social media brand icons (Facebook/Instagram/YouTube/X) as UI dependencies for the AI Video page.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest asks for platform-agnostic sharing/upload assistance and explicitly disallows direct social media integration; importing brand icons is not requested and may imply platform-specific UI beyond the requirement (though the actual usage is not visible due to truncation).
